meanings.definition: A surgical procedure for male sterilization in which the vas deferens are cut and tied off to prevent the release of sperm during ejaculation.
meanings.sent1: After the vasectomy, the man could no longer father children.
meanings.sent2: John decided to have a vasectomy to prevent any unplanned pregnancies.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that getting a vasectomy was like putting a lock on the sperm factory.
meanings.sent4: His decision to undergo a vasectomy was a permanent solution to birth control.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the vasectomy procedure in detail before the surgery.
